title: Big Thicket National Preserve: Laws & Policies
body: Laws & Policies       Superintendent's Compendium Click the link above to view the regulations that apply to all lands and waters within the boundaries of Big Thicket National Preserve. Firearms in Parks Law Click the link above to view information about the federal law governing the possession of firearms in National Parks. Off-Road Vehicles Click the link above to learn about the regulations concerning off-road vehicles in Big Thicket National Preserve, and the impacts these vehicles can have in natural areas.
